offering_type.description: The ReservedInstance offering type. Support for the newer types are coming soon!

duration.description: The duration of the ReservedInstance in seconds, 94608000 is 3 years, 31536000 is 1 year.

quantity.description: Number of instances to include in the reservation.

start_date.description: Date at which the ReservedInstance purchase should start from, this can be a future date.

auto_renew.description: Whether the ReservedInstance should be renewed every year or not; only applicable for 1 year ReservedInstances.

created_at.description: Timestamp of when the Reserved Instance Purchase was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp of when the Reserved Instance Purchase was created.
